DistanceLabel.Name: Show Distance Labels
DistanceLabel.Hint: Toggle to display distance labels on movement paths, based on Coriolis: The Great Dark rules.

Engaged.Name: Engaged Label
Engaged.Hint: Label for Engaged distance (adjacent square/less than the grid size). Leave null to use default ('Engaged'), or set your own custom label. Accepts a translation key.

Short.Name: Short Label
Short.Hint: Label for Short distance (same region). Leave null to use default ('Short'), or set your own custom label. Accepts a translation key.

Medium.Name: Medium Label
Medium.Hint: Label for Medium distance (adjacent region). Leave null to use default ('Medium'), or set your own custom label. Accepts a translation key.

Long.Name: Long Label
Long.Hint: Label for Long distance (between two and four regions). Leave null to use default ('Long'), or set your own custom label. Accepts a translation key.

Extreme.Name: Extreme Label
Extreme.Hint: Label for Extreme distance (more than four regions). Leave null to use default ('Extreme'), or set your own custom label. Accepts a translation key.

CountNoRegionAsZone.Name: Count No Region as Zone
CountNoRegionAsZone.Hint: If enabled, areas without a defined region will be treated as their own zone for movement calculations. If you are using gridless maps, or if you have gaps between regions, you may want to enable this setting.
